thread.title: Niamh Connell
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Niamh Connell

author: Niamh Connell
title: Niamh Connell
text: I had bought a pair of runners in the ECCO concession in Arnotts for €70. When I got home and looked online they are only €55. So I returned the original pair and bought them online instead. Would definitely use the online store in future
